content: Savings Investments Regular Shares Savings Plans (RSS) Asked by Utkarsh PandeyAsked on 21 Apr 2019If I have already set up a RSS before opening the multiplier account then will it still count towards my investment criteria for the multiplier account or must I redeem my fund and open a new one?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 22 Apr 2019Based on their website, it should be after you open your multiplier account. You should use the SSB ladder method instead as the RSP method only last for 12 months. But it will take 6 months and minimum $3,012 for the method to start working.0 comments0
